definitions.example: Looks like you've gained a new friend.

definitions.definition: To have or receive advantage or profit; to acquire gain; to grow rich; to advance in interest, health, or happiness; to make progress.
To come off winner or victor in; to be successful in; to obtain by competition.
definitions.example: to gain a battle; to gain a case at law

definitions.definition: To be more likely to catch or overtake an individual.

definitions.example: to gain the top of a mountain

definitions.definition: To draw into any interest or party; to win to one's side; to conciliate.
(of a clock or watch) To run fast.
